settings.text_2: Feel your belly gurgle with excitement, hit that button, and let us know where you want your box delivered! If this turns out to be an impulse buy, done on an empty stomach, no worries. Cancel anytime, no noodles attached.
Get your chopsticks ready while we pick the best flavor combinations for your box. No need to be patient - your box will be shipped immediately after purchase and will reach you in the next 2-6 days.
Where are we traveling tonight, chef? You have 10 exciting new tastes to explore! Is it going to be South Korea? Taiwan? Oh, Japan? Then don’t forget to say itadakimasu before you get slurpin’!

settings.title: What's in Our Boxes?
settings.heading: WHAT'S IN OUR BOXES?
settings.sub_title: Each month’s My Ramen Box is a unique surprise!

settings.text_2: Our team is ready to answer all your questions.

settings.title: Sign up to get 15% off your first order!

settings.deal_desc:
Introducing ‘’My Ramen Box’’ - a monthly subscription service, delivered right at your doorstep each month, to invite you on a journey of unique flavors and sensations.
Once you subscribe, there’s nothing else you need to worry about! Kick back and relax, while we put your ramen box together.

settings.text_1: We believe that food is more than just a fuel. It’s history, it’s culture, it’s all those memories… For this reason, we invite you on a journey - unlock a whole new world of unique flavors and sensations with a personalized ramen box every month and add some spice to the mundane!

settings.text_2: Every bite will transport you to the most authentic noodle places all over East Asia, just as if you were slurping your worries away right in a cozy diner. The difference? No need for a long flight - get that authentic experience right at your own home!

Forget the lengthy process! While you focus on being awesome, we assemble a personalized monthly box for you and deliver it straight to your doorstep. Get your chopsticks ready - your noodles will be ready in no time!

There’s no need to stick to the classic flavors. Broaden your taste horizons by trying out 10 new unique flavors each month! Treat every meal as a new exciting adventure and see what unique tastes you’re the most fascinated by.

settings.name: Cody
settings.quote: I was so surprised when the first box came! It’s awesome, I don’t need to spend time looking for quality ramen noodles and I can still have a delicious bowl whenever I want. I like bringing it to work or having it for dinner after work if I don't feel like spending time in my kitchen.

settings.name: Margaret
settings.quote: It’s a very special ramen subscription box. Beautiful design, delicious flavors, and I always learn something new because every box includes a fun fact about ramen culture! Sometimes I also make it for my guests, and I always share with them my newly found knowledge.

settings.name: Mark
settings.quote: Perfect for when you want a delicious meal fast. Quality ingredients from original countries, different flavors, easy recipes. It’s ideal for those days when you don’t have much time for cooking but don’t want to eat the same old sandwiches you always get on your way to work.

settings.name: Leslie
settings.quote: Absolutely in love!!! I love ramen, but I never thought it would be so easy to prepare such a delicious bowl in just a few minutes! There are enough flavors to choose from, it definitely makes my meals more interesting and less stressful. I highly recommend it!

settings.name: Jury
settings.quote: It’s a fun way to surprise myself every month. I love receiving the box, trying out new flavors, and creating new recipes, it’s so much fun! It reminds me of my trip to Asia, I might have to go back soon!!

settings.name: Laura
settings.quote: I could never find decent ramen at a local store, so decided to get this subscription box and I’m glad I did! Finally, I can enjoy my instant noodles at home without breaking the bank. You can always add extra ingredients that you like and have a restaurant-quality meal on your couch!

-Rachel K.

settings.text_1:
It was the love for adventures that led us to the greatest discovery of all - the heart-warming ramen.
Soon we realized that it doesn’t always take a chef to have that satisfying bowl of ramen. There’s a quick and easy way to explore this exotic world of flavors - instant noodles! 
This is how My Ramen Box was born!
We decided to collaborate with instant noodle suppliers all over East Asia to create an authentic food experience for you, just like the one we were looking for!
Join us on a monthly adventure in the big wide world of delicious noodles!
